abstrac: Abron Team paves the way for you in the digital world.
bio:
As an aspiring and expert team, we work in the areas of web design and development, mobile apps, e-commerce, Internet of Things and product design. The belief in this company is that any project is a problem that has its own right solution, and this solution should be created by focusing on the audience and its usage. Abron sits at the intersection of business, innovation, and technology; moreover, it tries to find the best solutions in a creative way.
Our goal is to provide a unique experience to make your life easier and more enjoyable in the digital world, what’s more, we try to create quality and up-to-date products that work properly.
Processes:
Hello!
Every project starts with a cup of coffee and a friendly chat. A chat in which we ambitiously talk about your future and your position.
Research & Scoping,
The first step is to gather information and therefore to build a first draft and a creative brief which will be the blueprint of the project. The more we know you and the project, the better solution we will offer.
Design,
After understanding every aspect of the project, we begin to design user experience and user interface. We do sketching, wire-framing, designing and animating to create smart and first-rate designs. At this stage, all the plans are being presented to you in order to be discussed and to get to the final design.
Front-end,
Every digital product needs a robust cross-platform interface. In this stage, we develop a responsive layout which works impeccably on each and every device.
Back-end & CMS,
Developing a scalable backend, with a standard coding which is reliable and optimized for clients’ needs, is our typical business.
Testing,
Extensive QA sessions help us identify the ways to improve the product. After the completion of the project, the test and examination sessions are carried out in the presence of the employer. Our goal is to provide a flawless product to launch the project.

1) We request project payments to be paid on milestones for mutually agreed milestones, which follows a review of the project by the client.

2) We work remotely for our clients from all over the world, so we are flexible about different time-zones.

3) Abron is a full-time software team working 40 to 50 hours a week.

4) Our clients can get in touch with us 24/7 via Email, Whatsapp, Skype, and Guru Messaging.

abstrac: Back Office Assistance - Bookkeeping | HR | Admin Assistance Operations - SOPs | Operational Efficiency | Resources Management Project Management - Project Support | Budget Tracker
bio:
For the last 17 years, Taskroots has been driven by customer satisfaction, with an average retention rate of six years. We thrive on delivering exemplary experience and tremendous value to our clients.

We specialize in setting up back office operations in HR, finance and administration. Our resources are trained on various cloud based platforms namely ADP, HRMS, Quickbooks, Zoho, MYOB, Xero, Freshbooks, Asana, Workplace and many others.

We have carved a niche for ourselves in operations management where the focus is on driving business operations by defining Standard Operating Procedures, and facilitating daily operations and overall function of the organization.

Our latest specialization is in project support, where we assist project managers in data compilation, expense tracking and configuration management.

Preferred communication method is email and skype. Daily updates are provided for ongoing projects. 

The regular working hours are 24X5. We cover weekends on special requests only.

Projects under $100 will be invoiced upon completion. Projects over $100 are invoiced at every milestone, mutually decided with the client.

WORK HOURS AND DAY:

EVERY DAY 12 HOURS FROM MONDAY TO FRIDAY. Weekends if required.

COMMUNICATION ON PHONE, SKYPE, IM, EMAIL ETC.

PAYMENT TERMS:

For projects over USD 1000 :

We usually charge 25% advance and the all other project payments are based on various milestone based on updates shown as per the project plan. The contract service agreement includes the final proposal having clear updates based milestones, Assumptions, support period along with standard business terms. Delivery will be made after final payment.

For projects equal to or under USD 1000 :

**50% upfront, to get us started on selection.
**50% on showing completed work.

The aforementioned milestones are set after thorough discussion with our clients. We are, nevertheless, open to FAIR negotiation. We shall sign a standard NDA on request. We will provide 30 days free technical support, after delivery.

Note:

We are flexible to discuss and agree the payment terms and schedule that works best for both parties
